excerpt: Museum with anthropological & natural history artifacts, plus art such as pottery & sculptures.
detail_description: Mahant Ghasidas Memorial Museum in Raipur is a treasure trove of archaeological and cultural artifacts, established in 1875 by Raja Mahant Ghasidas. The museum showcases over 12,000 rare items across three wings, including anthropological and natural history artifacts, traditional handcrafts, tribal art, pottery, sculptures, inscriptions, coins and more.
name: Mahant Ghasidas Memorial Museum
address: 6JVV+HX3, Ghadi Chowk, Raj Bhawan Rd, Civil Lines, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

excerpt: Small green strip with carved reliefs featuring Mahatma Gandhi, plus a play area & yoga classes.
detail_description: Gandhi Udyan Park is a serene oasis nestled in the heart of Raipur, dedicated to the legacy of Mahatma Gandhi. This beautifully landscaped public garden offers a perfect blend of relaxation and recreation for visitors of all ages. With its spacious walking and jogging paths lined with lush greenery, it invites both locals and tourists to enjoy leisurely strolls or invigorating runs.
name: Gandhi Udyan Park
address: Nayapara Rd, New Mangal Bazar, Nayapara, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

detail_description: The Town Hall in Raipur, originally known as the Victoria Jubilee Hall, is a significant historical site that reflects India's post-independence struggle. While it now functions as a government office and requires prior permission for visits, it holds a wealth of cultural history about Raipur. Constructed in 1887 and inaugurated in 1890, the building has been renovated once and stands as a testament to the city's past.
name: Town Hall
address: 6JWR+9X8, Collectorate, Kachche Wali Chowk Garden Ke Paas, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

excerpt: 800-acre animal park & zoo also featuring a safari experience with lush landscapes.
detail_description: Nandan Van Zoo is an expansive 800-acre animal park and zoo that offers a safari experience amidst lush landscapes. The zoo is dedicated to conservation efforts, nurturing native fauna such as tiger and leopard families set against scenic lake backdrops. Visitors can embark on special lion safaris through sprawling green habitats, providing an up-close encounter with these magnificent beasts in their natural environment.
name: Nandan Van Zoo
address: 7GMV+5WM, Atari, Hatband, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

detail_description: Singh’s Champaran Handi Mutton & Biryani is a must-visit spot in the serene village of Champaran, known for its beautiful temples and tranquil ambiance. The place is highly recommended for mutton lovers, offering an original taste of Champaran with its flavorful mutton handi. Visitors praise the great taste and generous quantity of the dishes, particularly highlighting the chicken biryani as one of the best they've ever tasted.
name: Singh’s Champaran Handi Mutton & Biryani
address: Shop168, Street 3, Sant Kanwar Ram Chowk, Katora Talab, Civil Lines, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492007, India

detail_description: Kaivalya Dham Jain Temple, located on the outskirts of the city, is a sprawling complex housing several exquisite marble temples dedicated to Jainism. The architectural beauty of the structure is a sight to behold, offering a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of urban life. Each temple within this spiritual haven is dedicated to one of the 24 Tirthankars, with the central deity being Lord Adinath.
name: Kaivalya Dham Jain Temple
address: 6GWH+Q9G, Patan Kumhari Rd, Chhattisgarh 490042, India

excerpt: Raipur is the capital city of Chhattisgarh state in central India. In the center, the ancient Dudhadhari Math temple is a sacred monument dedicated to Lord Rama, decorated with scenes from the epic poem “Ramayana.” Nearby, a statue of the Hindu monk Swami Vivekananda towers over Vivekananda Sarovar lake. Southeast, Purkhouti Muktangan is an open-air museum featuring landscaped grounds, statues and tribal artifacts.
detail_description: Raipur, known as the capital city of Chhattisgarh state in central India, offers a mix of ancient and modern attractions. The Dudhadhari Math temple stands as a sacred monument dedicated to Lord Rama, adorned with depictions from the epic poem 'Ramayana.' Nearby, the imposing statue of Hindu monk Swami Vivekananda overlooks Vivekananda Sarovar lake.
name: Raipur
address: Chhattisgarh, India

name: Banjari mata mandir
address: 6HVQ+5Q9, Banjari Mandir, Amanaka, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492010, India

detail_description: Kankali Talab, a serene pond in Raipur, holds historical and spiritual significance as the former abode of revered sages. The presence of a small temple dedicated to Lord Shiva at the center adds to its sacred aura. Legend has it that the water possesses healing properties for itching, attracting visitors seeking relief. Additionally, the abundance of small fishes offers a natural fish spa experience.
name: Kankali Talab
address: अवधिया पारा, Kankalipara, Aminpara, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001

detail_description: Pujya Shadani Darbar is a sprawling 12-acre pilgrimage site situated just nine kilometers from Raipur on the Dhamtari road. The complex includes a large hall housing an image of Dhuni Sahib and intricately carved depictions of various deities.
name: Pujya Shadani Darbar
address: 7M32+5M8, Pandri Rd, Pandri, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492004, India

detail_description: The ISKCON temple in Raipur, a recent addition to their collection of famous temples across the country, is still under construction. While the main building is being completed, the idols have been temporarily relocated to another temple. Nevertheless, one can still witness the exquisite beauty of this temple. The Hare Krishna movement led by ISKCON aims to foster devotion towards Lord Krishna and Hinduism worldwide. The Raipur branch serves as an initiative to connect society with divine grace.
name: ISKCON Raipur
address: Hare Krishna Dham, Great Eastern Rd, opp. Maharishi Vidya Mandir, Alopi Nagar, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

detail_description: Nestled in the city of Raipur, the 900-year-old Mahamaya Temple is a revered site dedicated to the Hindu goddess Mahamaya. This ancient temple boasts stunning architecture and is home to various Hindu deities such as Mahakali, Bhadrakali, Lord Shiva, Lord Hanuman, and more. The temple's structure is supported by 16 thick stone columns and surrounded by 18-inch thick walls.
name: Mahamaya temple
address: nearby Mahamaya mandir, Barauda, Chhattisgarh 493111, India

detail_description: Vivekananda Sarovar, also known as Budha Talab, is a prominent tourist attraction in Raipur, India. The area surrounding the lake offers various recreational facilities such as shopping malls, gardens, hotels, restaurants, and cafes. The serene lake is adorned with a statue of the revered Hindu monk Swami Vivekananda and is located near the ancient Dudhadhari Math temple dedicated to Lord Rama.
name: Vivekananda Sarovar [Budha Talab]
address: Budhapara, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001

name: Vivekanand sarovar
address: 7J3P+88H, Raipur - Bilaspur Expy, Station Road, Moudhapara, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

excerpt: Vibrant mall featuring brand-name retail shops, restaurants, a movie theater & kids' entertainment.
detail_description: Magneto - The Mall in Raipur is a vibrant and comprehensive entertainment complex that has become a popular hub for both locals and tourists. It offers an extensive range of shopping options from national and international brands, along with multiplex cinemas, a diverse food court, a gaming zone for children, and various retail stores. As the largest mall in Raipur, it provides couples with opportunities to watch movies, play games, shop, dine, and more.
name: Magneto The Mall
address: NH 53, Great Eastern Rd, beside Signature Homes 2, Jivan Vihar, Labhandih, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

excerpt: Kid-friendly educational center featuring interactive science & technology exhibits.
detail_description: Chhattisgarh Regional Science Centre is a kid-friendly educational center with interactive science and technology exhibits. It's well-organized and offers a great learning experience for both adults and children, enriching their general knowledge in an interactive manner. The museum features fun science demonstrations, historical and cultural specimens, as well as informative displays about Chhattisgarh culture. It's an amazing place for students to visit, offering minimal ticket prices for entry and shows.
name: Chhattisgarh Regional Science Centre
address: 7MGJ+PW, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492014, India

name: Ram mandir
address: 6JRQ+PWM, Krishak Nagar, Shastri Market, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

detail_description: Ambuja City Centre in Raipur is a popular destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall offers a wide range of retail outlets, eateries, and entertainment options including a multiplex cinema and gaming zones. With its beautiful architecture and pleasant ambiance, it's an ideal place to spend time with family and friends. The mall features both international and local brands across fashion, electronics, and lifestyle as well as refined dining options.
name: Ambuja City Centre
address: Main, Vidhan Sabha Rd, Mowa, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492007, India

excerpt: Urban mall offering international & local retailers, plus a food court, multiplex & kids' play area.
detail_description: City Centre Mall is a bustling urban shopping destination that features an array of both international and local retailers. The mall also boasts a food court, multiplex cinema and a play area for children that offers rides like the London bus and toy train. In addition to its range of shopping brands, the mall's friendly ambiance is noteworthy, with comfortable spaces such as bookstores, restaurants and cafes providing visitors with a welcoming experience.
name: Raipur City Center Mall
address: 7J3W+WFW, IGVP, Pandri, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

excerpt: Water park with colorful looping slides & a wave pool, plus lockers & swimsuit rentals.
detail_description: Wonderland water park offers an array of vibrant looping slides and a wave pool, granting visitors unlimited fun and excitement. This captivating destination in Raipur attracts not only locals but also tourists with its delightful ambiance and breathtaking scenery. Admission fees are reasonably priced at 350rs on weekdays and 400rs on weekends. While some rides cater to younger children, a few standout attractions provide thrilling experiences. However, it is worth noting that the functionality of certain rides may be lacking.
name: Wonderland water Park
address: wonderland waterpark, Indraprastha Colony, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492013, India

detail_description: Budhapara, a stunning lake constructed in 1404 A.D. by King Brahmadei, the Kalchuri emperor, is a popular destination that draws numerous visitors annually. The expansive waters of the lake evoke a feeling of tranquility and peace among its spectators.
name: Budhapara
address: Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

detail_description: Mallhar Photography is a must-visit for those seeking excellent and affordable photography services. Visitors can expect top-notch service without breaking the bank.
name: Mallhar Photography
address: B-1/30, Rohinipuram, Lokmanya Society, DDU Nagar, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

detail_description: The New Interstate Bus Stand in Bhatgaon, Raipur, is a remarkable facility that stands out for its cleanliness and comprehensive amenities. This initiative by the Chhattisgarh Government aims to elevate bus travel standards across the state. Travelers can enjoy a well-maintained waiting hall with comfortable seating, 24-hour security, and easy access to drinking water and restrooms. The bus stand offers excellent connectivity with routes to major cities and features various food stalls at reasonable prices.
name: New Interstate Bus Stand,Bhatgaon,Raipur
address: 6J9J+W7M, Ravanbhatha, Patel Para, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492013, India

detail_description: Nestled in the vibrant area of Pandri, Raipur, Chhattisgarh, this charming 3-star hotel offers a delightful stay for travelers. Conveniently situated beside Laxmi Vilas Bank and just steps away from the bustling Pandri cloth market, guests can enjoy easy access to local shopping and attractions.
name: Pandri Rd
address: Raipur, Chhattisgarh, India

detail_description: Kevalya Dham Rd is home to the stunning Kevalya Dham, a prominent Jain temple that draws visitors from near and far. Known as Sri Adinath Jain Swhetambhar Tirth, this architectural marvel is crafted from pristine white marble, exuding an aura of tranquility and beauty. The temple complex boasts 26 temples of varying sizes, each contributing to the spiritual ambiance and cultural richness of Raipur.
name: Kevalya Dham Rd
address: Chhattisgarh 490042, India

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Gujarat, Hatkeshwar Mahadev Mandir is a revered shrine dedicated to Lord Shiva. This temple stands out not only for its spiritual significance but also for its stunning architecture that draws visitors from all walks of life. The serene ambiance and intricate carvings create a perfect backdrop for meditation and reflection. Pilgrims flock here, especially during festivals, to partake in vibrant rituals and seek blessings.
name: Hatkeshwar mahadev mandir
address: Kota, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492009, India

detail_description: Rajkumar College Raipur, a distinguished educational institution in Eastern India, has a storied legacy dating back to its founding in 1882 by Sir Andrew Fraser. Initially established as the Rajkumar School in Jabalpur for the sons of ruling chiefs and zamindars, it relocated to Raipur in 1894 and evolved into a full-fledged boarding school.
name: Rajkumar College Raipur
address: Gate 2, G.E Road, Near, Rajkumar College Rd, Mukut Nagar, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492013, India

detail_description: The Chhattisgarh State Renewable Energy Development Agency has created a remarkable destination that feels like a paradise for children. This vibrant park is adorned with lush greenery, captivating science puzzles, enchanting musical fountains, and delightful boating experiences. What truly sets this park apart is its commitment to sustainability; it operates entirely on solar energy.
name: Chhattisgarh State Renewable Energy Development Agency
address: 6M8W+39F, VIP Rd, near Energy Education Park, Post, Devpuri, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492015, India

excerpt: Riverside spot for bathing around a forest waterfall, with a Hindu temple, shops & food stalls.
name: Ghatarani Waterfall
address: Jamahi, Chhattisgarh 493996, India

excerpt: Lake with an island statue of guru Swami Vivekananda, plus pleasure boats & an evening light show.
detail_description: Budha Talab Raipur, also known as Swami Vivekanand Sarovar, is a serene oasis in the heart of Raipur city. The vast lake offers boating and features a small park with a larger-than-life statue of Swami Vivekananda. Families can enjoy the charming children's garden with thrilling slides and engaging activities. As night falls, the fountains light up, creating a magical atmosphere.
name: Budha Talab Raipur
address: Vivekananda Sarovar, Budhapara, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

detail_description: The Rajiv Lochan Temple is a stunning representation of Hindu culture, exuding an atmosphere of tranquility. The temple premises house various other temples, and visitors have the option to stay in Rajim and avail food facilities. The administration is dedicated to enhancing the overall development of the temple, which is commendable. Amenities such as washrooms and parking are conveniently available, while roadside food stalls offer nourishment.
name: Shree Rajiv Lochan Temple
address: XV7H+H2P, Rajim, Gobra, Chhattisgarh 493885, India

detail_description: Atal Park, formerly known as Central Park, is a sprawling haven in New Raipur that offers something for everyone. The park is meticulously maintained, ensuring a clean and pleasant environment for visitors to stroll and enjoy the fresh air. It features a kid-friendly playground, making it an ideal spot for families to spend quality time together. Additionally, the park boasts ample space for walking, an amphitheater, yoga areas, and a cafeteria.
name: Atal Park
address: 5Q5M+5F3, Naya Raipur Marg, Sector 19, Kayabandha, Atal Nagar-Nava Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492101, India

excerpt: Spacious park with gardens & a pond for boating, plus a center with exhibits on renewable energy.
detail_description: Energy Park, also known as Urja Park, is a themed destination in Raipur that combines entertainment and education. The park spans across a vast area filled with lush gardens and even offers boating activities in the evening. Visitors can explore exhibits and models showcasing various energy sources like solar, wind, and bio-energy. This makes it an ideal spot for students and environmentally conscious individuals to learn about energy conservation.
name: Energy Park(Urja park)
address: Fundahar, Chhattisgarh 492012, India

excerpt: Sprawling gardens with long, paved paths & large tribal sculptures reflecting the local culture.
detail_description: Purkhouti Muktangan is a vast park in Chhattisgarh that showcases the region's rich cultural and historical heritage through its extensive gardens, paved pathways, and impressive tribal sculptures. While some visitors feel that the maintenance could be improved, it remains an interesting place to explore. The park offers insights into various aspects of Chhattisgarh's arts and culture, making it an ideal spot for a family picnic or leisurely visit.
name: Purkhouti Muktangan
address: Sector 24, Uparwara, Chhattisgarh 492101, India

excerpt: Manmade park offering safari-style tours through open areas with deer, lions, tigers & bears.
detail_description: Nandanvan Jungle Safari in Nava Raipur is a manmade sanctuary and zoo offering safari-style tours through open areas with deer, lions, tigers, and bears. The safari bus is fully covered and air-conditioned, providing a comfortable experience for visitors. There's also an option for non-AC buses. The park features a variety of creatures in the zoo area as well. Visitors can enjoy waiting in the hall or spending time at the snacks store while exploring the wildlife closely.
name: Nandanvan Jungle Safari, Nava Raipur
address: Sector 39, Khanduwa, Atal Nagar-Nava Raipur, Chhattisgarh 493661, India

excerpt: Palm-lined paths in a lush urban space with outdoor exercise equipment, a play area & yoga sessions.
detail_description: Gandhi Udyan in Raipur is a serene and green oasis amidst the bustling city. The park boasts palm-fringed walkways, an abundance of trees, as well as outdoor exercise equipment and a play area for children. Yoga sessions are also conducted here, making it an ideal space for relaxation and physical activity.
name: Gandhi Udyan, Raipur
address: 18, Katora Talab Main Rd, Katora Talab, Civil Lines, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

detail_description: Guru Ghasidas Chowk, Nagar Gadhi is a well-maintained and picturesque park located at the Ghadi chowk. It offers a beautiful view of the Tall Clock tower and an artificial Waterfall wall, making it a great spot for photography. This chowk is quite big and serves as the main hub after the railway station, with easy access to city buses, magic vehicles, and autos for transportation.
name: Guru Ghasidas Chowk, Nagar Gadhi
address: 6JVV+W5F, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

excerpt: Vast art museum in a historic building with landscaped grounds & a sculpture garden.
detail_description: The Mahakoshal Art Gallery, located in Raipur, is a well-established and organized museum housed in a historic building with landscaped grounds and a sculpture garden. It showcases a diverse collection of local artwork, encouraging regional talent while also serving as a venue for art exhibitions. The gallery's unique octagonal shape makes it an attraction for tourists visiting the city. Visitors can explore the rich history of tribal culture and historical monuments of Chhattisgarh state at this captivating destination.
name: Mahakoshal Art Gallery
address: 6JVV+F2G, Civil Lines, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India

excerpt: Riverside Hindu temple to Lord Shiva with an elaborately decorated exterior, founded in 1402.
detail_description: The Hatkeshwar Mahadev temple, a riverside Hindu shrine dedicated to Lord Shiva, was established in 1402. After the Diwali festivities, I visited this temple on my own and found it devoid of crowds. As the sole person present before the magnificent deity, I witnessed the exquisite exterior adorned with intricate designs. The temple is exceptionally well-maintained, and its majestic Shiva Linga commands reverence.
name: Shree Hatkeshwar Mahadev Raipur
address: Mhadev ghat chok, Patan - Raipur Rd, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492013, India
